*** Sat, 3 Sep 2016 22:13:35 ***
TEST FOR GRANGER-CAUSALITY:
H0: "realcons, realinv" do not Granger-cause "realgdp"

Test statistic l = 11.1461
pval-F( l; 8, 561) = 0.0000 

TEST FOR INSTANTANEOUS CAUSALITY:
H0: No instantaneous causality between "realcons, realinv" and "realgdp"

Test statistic: c = 85.8428
pval-Chi( c; 2) = 0.0000
